channel.title: The guide that helped me in bed
channel.description:
:| Before you start blabering how sick I am, let's start with some rules. 1:People who are more interested in being a virgen than becoming a man then GET THE F¥¢K OUT!!!! 2:Don't criticize me.I got this info from my pervert of a friend. 3:If you're still here that means that want to be and you want your woman to take you into bed every night. So for fuck's sake do'nt be a faggot.And one more thing,I take no credit in this. Click here http://www.fleshlight.com/legendsgym/index.php
Oh yeah,my psp is the only way i can acces the internet,so "typing" is'nt exactly one of my things.

item.dc:creator: @Swift Swift
item.description:
@Swift wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:2, topic:39147”]lol fuck that man. When I was little, I read my dad’s Kama Sutra. That explains something like 143 sex positions and like 5000 ways to turn yourself and partner on lol. Indians know how to screw.

If you want to learn about sex and everything about it, download/buy the Indians version of the Kama Sutra. Don’t get the british copy, because they changed it around a bit and took some fun stuff out. :rolleyes:[/quote]

Oh wow, you’re so cool Ron!
